sentences.en: A passport that is out of date is invalid.
Check the expiration date on your passport.
sentences.cn: 检查一下你护照上的截止日期。

sentences.en: Evans was trying to obtain a false passport and other documents.
sentences.cn: 埃文斯正试图取得一本假护照和其他证件。

sentences.en: For foreign holidays you will need a valid passport.
sentences.cn: 出国度假需持有效护照。

sentences.en: He stowed his passport away safely in a drawer.
sentences.cn: 他把护照妥善保存在抽届里.

sentences.en: He views boxing as his passport out of poverty.
sentences.cn: 他把拳击看作自己摆脱贫困的手段.

sentences.en: He went straight through Passport Control without incident.
sentences.cn: 他很顺利地通过了护照检查处。

sentences.en: He's gone off with my passport.
Inside the passport was a folded slip of paper.
sentences.cn: 护照里面有张折起的纸片。

sentences.en: My attempt to get a new passport turned into a Kafkaesque nightmare.
sentences.cn: 我试图申请新护照的过程变成了一场官样文章的噩梦。

sentences.en: Officials type each passport number into a computer.
sentences.cn: 行政人员将每个护照号都输入计算机中.

sentences.en: The only passport to success is hard work.
sentences.cn: 获得成功的唯一途径就是艰苦奋斗。

sentences.en: They need to check that your passport is in order.
sentences.cn: 他们要检查一下你的护照是否有效。

sentences.en: When I lost my passport, I felt such an idiot.
sentences.cn: 我丢了护照时觉得自己像个大傻瓜。

sentences.en: You must hand over your passport before you leave.
You'll have to get a passport, and you'll also need a visa.
sentences.cn: 你必须申办护照, 同时还需要有签证.

phrases.tran_cn: 护照检查处；入境检验；验护照

trans.tran_en: a small official document that you get from your government, that proves who you are, and which you need in order to leave your country and enter other countries
